title: Star Hospital, Hojai
description: Turnkey hospital development including construction, MGPS setup, and modular OT. Delivered on schedule with full functional readiness.
actualWorkTitle: Medical Gas Pipeline Installation at Star Hospital
actualWorkDesc: Turnkey hospital development including construction, MGPS setup, and modular OT. Delivered on schedule with full functional readiness.

bullets: MGPS including oxygen, vacuum, and air pipelines
Modular OT and integrated ICU with bed head panels

descBlocks.text: Star Hospital in Hojai stands as a benchmark project executed by Alex Healthcare System. The project included complete hospital construction, end-to-end medical gas pipeline installation, and a fully modular OT setup.

The hospital features a 70-bed capacity, vacuum & air plant systems, and energy-efficient design. It now operates as one of Hojai’s most trusted multi-speciality facilities, showcasing Alex Healthcare’s turnkey capability.

title: Kapili Hospital, Assam
description: Full-scale gas pipeline project completed with precision engineering. Customized for effective medical utility distribution. Designed for scalability and long-term performance.
actualWorkTitle: Custom Medical Pipeline Setup at Kapili Hospital
actualWorkDesc: Full-scale gas pipeline project completed with precision engineering. Customized for effective medical utility distribution. Designed for scalability and long-term performance.

bullets: Pipeline layout, plant room configuration, and outlet installation
Future-ready setup with safety alarms and control valves

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare System played a vital role in elevating Kapili Hospital’s infrastructure by executing a complete MGPS setup. This project aimed to deliver reliable oxygen, suction, and compressed air systems across wards, ICUs, and minor OT spaces.

The system was configured to accommodate future capacity upgrades and included comprehensive safety features. Kapili Hospital now operates with greater efficiency, optimized care delivery, and zero disruption during emergencies.

title: Health Planet Hospital, Nagaon
description: Custom MGPS and OT installations to upgrade existing infrastructure. Enhanced ICU operations with scrub station support.
actualWorkTitle: Modular OT & Bed Setup at Health Planet Hospital
actualWorkDesc: Custom MGPS and OT installations to upgrade existing infrastructure. Enhanced ICU operations with scrub station support.

bullets: Bed head panels and basic OT infrastructure
Emergency backup, safety valves, and alarm systems

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare upgraded Health Planet Hospital with a combination of gas pipeline installations and essential OT infrastructure. Central suction and oxygen lines were deployed across critical zones.
These upgrades enabled smooth coordination between departments, ensured staff readiness, and minimized contamination risks.

title: Metro Hospital, Guwahati
description: Advanced modular and semi-modular OT theatres installed. Laminar flow, pendants, and curtains for modern surgical zones.
actualWorkTitle: Modular ICU Components Installation at Various Hospitals
actualWorkDesc: Advanced modular and semi-modular OT theatres installed. Laminar flow, pendants, and curtains for modern surgical zones.

bullets: Two modular and two semi-modular OTs
Laminar airflow, HEPA filters, pendants, and LED lighting

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare introduced modular flexibility to Metro Hospital through the installation of fully modular and semi-modular OTs. All setups were aligned with infection control norms and procedural workflow.
The project supports a higher volume of surgical activity with increased safety, shorter turnovers, and better clinical outcomes.

title: Nagaon Metro Hospital & Research Centre
description: Single modular OT with complete theatre accessories and anti-microbial flooring. Created for optimal surgical control.
actualWorkTitle: Vacuum Pump Installations at Various Hospitals
actualWorkDesc: Single modular OT with complete theatre accessories and anti-microbial flooring. Created for optimal surgical control.

bullets: Track and curtain installations, scrub sinks

descBlocks.text: At Nagaon Metro Hospital, Alex Healthcare focused on redesigning OT spaces for optimal sterility. Surgical zones were upgraded using hygienic surfaces and medical-grade accessories.
The result was an aseptic, efficient environment with minimal downtime and maximum surgical throughput.

title: Health City Hospital, Guwahati
description: Six full modular OTs installed with laminar airflow and scrub zones. One of the region’s largest OT enhancement projects.
actualWorkTitle: Vacuum Pump Installations at Various Hospitals
actualWorkDesc: Six full modular OTs installed with laminar airflow and scrub zones. One of the region’s largest OT enhancement projects.

bullets: Laminar flow systems and custom scrub stations

descBlocks.text: Health City Hospital’s extensive OT wing was developed with six fully modular setups tailored to departments like gastro, ortho, neuro, and general surgery.
The modular infrastructure improved surgical precision, scheduling flexibility, and staff efficiency. It stands as a reference project in the region.

title: IHR (Guwahati, Siliguri, Kolkata)
description: IVF-specialized OT upgrades across 3 locations. Delivered with sealed cleanroom systems, pass boxes, and surgical fittings.
actualWorkTitle: Vacuum Pump Installations at Various Hospitals
actualWorkDesc: IVF-specialized OT upgrades across 3 locations. Delivered with sealed cleanroom systems, pass boxes, and surgical fittings.

bullets: Vinyl flooring, scrub stations, pass boxes, pendants

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare set up IVF-compatible modular OTs across IHR’s three facilities, addressing high-precision needs like temperature, airflow, and humidity control.
These clean environments ensured embryo safety and procedural consistency across all locations.

title: Phoenix Healthcare, Kolkata
description: Enhanced OT functionality through scrub station setup, sealed doors, and essential accessory fittings.
actualWorkTitle: Vacuum Pump Installations at Various Hospitals
actualWorkDesc: Enhanced OT functionality through scrub station setup, sealed doors, and essential accessory fittings.

descBlocks.text: Alex Healthcare enhanced Phoenix Healthcare’s operation rooms with key accessory installations, improving workflow and hygiene without disrupting ongoing operations.
The upgrade significantly boosted staff readiness and streamlined surgical prep and recovery cycles.
